title: Slow cooker luscious lamb and tomato stew
ingredients: ['2 onions, sliced', 'olive oil', '350g diced lamb', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', 'salt and pepper', '1 splash white wine (optional)', '1 pinch dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '250ml lamb stock']
